title: plugout_ijk
description: Connects to AFNI and sends (i,j,k) dataset indices to control the viewpoint.

host.title: Host name
host.description: Connect to AFNI running on the specified computer using TCP/IP.

name.title: Plugout name
name.description: Use the string 'sss' for the name that AFNI assigns to this plugout.

port_offset.title: Port offset
port_offset.description: Provide a port offset to allow multiple instances of communicating programs to operate on the same machine.

port_quiet.title: Port offset quiet
port_quiet.description: Provide a port offset like -np, but more quiet in the face of adversity.

port_bloc_offset.title: Port bloc offset
port_bloc_offset.description: Provide a port offset block for easier port management.

max_bloc.title: Max port bloc
max_bloc.description: Print the current value of MAX_BLOC and exit.

max_bloc_quiet.title: Max port bloc quiet
max_bloc_quiet.description: Print MAX_BLOC value only and exit.

num_assigned_ports.title: Number of assigned ports
num_assigned_ports.description: Print the number of assigned ports used by AFNI then quit.

num_assigned_ports_quiet.title: Number of assigned ports quiet
num_assigned_ports_quiet.description: Prints the number of assigned ports quietly.
